name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: mapreduce.job.end-notification.max.attempts
description:
The maximum number of times a URL will be read for providing job
    end notification. Cluster administrators can set this to limit how long
    after end of a job, the Application Master waits before exiting. Must be
    marked as final to prevent users from overriding this.

name: dfs.namenode.reencrypt.edek.threads
description:
Maximum number of re-encrypt threads to contact the KMS
    and re-encrypt the edeks.

name: mapreduce.job.counters.max
description: The max number of user counters allowed per job.

name: hadoop.security.group.mapping.ldap.num.attempts
description:
This property is the number of attempts to be made for LDAP operations.
    If this limit is exceeded, LdapGroupsMapping will return an empty
    group list.

name: dfs.balancer.max-size-to-move
description:
Maximum number of bytes that can be moved by the balancer in a single
    thread.

name: ftp.bytes-per-checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  ftp.stream-buffer-size

name: hadoop.http.authentication.token.validity
description:
Indicates how long (in seconds) an authentication token is valid before it has
    to be renewed.
